Application configuration


ADC Configuration

This one is used by potentiometer like a mouse's scroll

#define USE_ADC
 Enable or not the ADC usage.
#define ADC_PRESCALER   64
 ADC Prescaler value.
#define ADC_RIGHT_ADJUST_RESULT   1
 Right adjust.
#define ADC_INTERNAL_VREF   2
 AVCC As reference voltage (See adc_drv.h).

 10ms before looking for new mouse hardware event

Define Documentation

#define TARGET_BOARD   STK525

< Scheduler tasks declaration

To include proper target hardware definitions, select target board (USBKEY, STK525, STK600)
